Articles.Content:
I have made a plugin that once added to the ship at launch a gui window will appear for it and it will have a slider to change a variable in the plugin. Is there a way that I could have a window spawned for each time the part was added (if the part was on the ship three times you would have three windows and three sliders///// or even better one window and three sliders). I would also need each slider to correspond to the certain part or at least a different variable. thanks in advance

edit - went on to IRC and someone help with the answer. i just had to make the windows have different id numbers so a new one would spawn

Edited December 4, 2013 by polimerjones
